name: Pinnacle Rewards & Recognition
description: Pinnacle customers are brands and leaders who believe in recognition and appreciation and want to build a happy workplace. They want to give the best to their people instead of just organising a recognition event. Over 2700 brands have trusted us in the last two decades to make their people, their customers, their channel partners and even their friends and family feel special, feel appreciated - making people feel they matter.
Headline: Making people feel they matter
ShortDescription: Pinnacle helps companies get the most from their recognition and appreciation programs.
enhanced_description: Pinnacle Rewards & Recognition is a comprehensive HR technology solution focused on Total Rewards, helping organizations cultivate a happy and engaged workplace through effective recognition and appreciation programs. With over two decades of experience since its launch in 2000, Pinnacle has earned the trust of over 2700 brands by going beyond traditional recognition events. It aims to make employees, customers, channel partners, and even friends and family feel special and appreciated, ultimately making people feel they matter. The platform supports various HR functions, including employee recognition software, performance management systems, and benefits administration services, all contributing to enhanced employee engagement, satisfaction, and overall happiness programs.
key_use_cases: Administration of Benefits related to Rewards
competitive_advantages: Focus on holistic recognition and appreciation, extending beyond events
Emphasis on emotional impact: making people feel special and that they matter
roi_benefits: Stronger relationships with customers and channel partners
Optimized effectiveness of recognition and appreciation programs
